tool_description: PlagSpotter API allows to check online and offline content for plagiarism or duplication.
name: Duplicate Content Checking
title: Duplicate Content Checking

api_list.name: Request the Status of your Check
api_list.description: To get the checking status for particular text, use getTextStatus method. - See more at: http://www.plagspotter.com/api/#sthash.uU8QX4cy.dpuf

api_list.name: Get Results
api_list.description: To get the result report of duplicate content checking request, use getResult method. - See more at: http://www.plagspotter.com/api/#sthash.uU8QX4cy.dpuf

api_list.name: Get Result with Quotes
api_list.description: To get the checking results with the quotations from search engines, use getResultWithQuotes method. - See more at: http://www.plagspotter.com/api/#sthash.uU8QX4cy.dpuf

api_list.name: Get Plagiarism Percent
api_list.description: To get the percentage of the duplicate content, use getPlagiarismPercent method.
